verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> you in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7682>defend<s%> you;
<S%H7971>Send<s%> you <S%H5828>help<s%> from the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and <S%H5582>strengthen<s%> you out of <S%H6726>Zion;<s%>
<S%H5414>Grant<s%> you according to your own <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6098>counsel.<s%>

We will <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> and in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> we will set up our <S%H1713>banners:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4862>petitions.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> I that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saves<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed;<s%> he will <S%H6030>hear<s%> him from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> with the <S%H3468>saving<s%> <S%H1369>strength<s%> of his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand.<s%>
<S%H428>Some<s%> trust in <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H428>some<s%> in <S%H5483>horses:<s%> but we will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>
They are <S%H3766>brought<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> and <S%H5307>fallen:<s%> but we are <S%H6965>risen,<s%> and <S%H5749>stand<s%> upright.
